text: Ice Shard Drake is mighty creature usually living in icy caverns of Norse lands, its icy spikes can pierce everything in its vicinity.
Elite unseelie guard, can form whirlwind that will protect units around them against arrows.
Unseelie spearmen that can use their magical spears to freeze enemy to the ground.
Riders donned in ice armour who can ride like a wind and strike like a hurricane.
Snow golems, best soldiers money can buy.....well best soldiers my money can buy.
